audioText: Elle a mal au dos après avoir passé toute la journée debout sur un pied.
question: Why does her back hurt?
options: Because she spent all day standing on one foot
Because she lifted heavy boxes at work
Because she slept in an uncomfortable position
Because she ran a long distance
explanation: The text states 'Elle a mal au dos après avoir passé toute la journée debout sur un pied' - Her back hurts after spending all day standing on one foot. This targets the nouns 'dos', 'journée', and 'pied' in a physical discomfort context.
source: Strategic noun targeting: dos, journée, pied
